description: consulting and advisory services for implementation of ServiceNow Software as a Service.
full_summary:
# Solutions Based Informatics Professional Services (SBIPS)
## Request for Proposal Documents
### Description of Work
The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal to provide consulting and advisory professional services for the implementation of the ServiceNow Software as a Service (ServiceNow). The contractor(s) will assist in the development and implementation of a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) production instance of ServiceNow using the Out-Of-the-Box functionality of the Information Technology Service Management and IT Operations Management applications for the CRA’s Cloud Operations team.

### Security Requirements
The successful contractor will be required to meet the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) Security Requirements (SRCL) and minimum corporate security standards.

### Tendering Process
This requirement is open to contractors who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the Information Technology Systems Management Stream.

### Tender Closing Date
The bid submission deadline is September 21, 2022, at 14:00:00.

### Contact Information
For inquiries regarding this request for proposal, please submit your questions to Julie Trudel, which can be reached at [julie.trudel@cra-arc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.trudel@cra-arc.gc.ca). The contact phone number is 438-455-6406.

### Additional Information
Solutions-Based Informatics Professional Services (SBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three (3) times per year. Contractors interested in becoming a "Qualified SA Holder" are encouraged to contact RCNMDAI-NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca. 

### Notice of Tenders
This notice serves as an announcement of the Canada Revenue Agency’s Tender for Solutions-Based Informatics Professional Services (SBIPS). Tender documentation will be made available directly to qualified contractors who have been invited to submit a proposal.

### Technical Specifications
The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) is seeking professional services to implement a ServiceNow Software as a Service (ServiceNow) solution. Interested contractors must submit their proposal before the tender closing date to be considered for this project. 
Please ignore any white spaces or France version that can appear in the output. Candidate matched all your requirement. 

Note that two other fields of output carries English and French  while only requiring a field for English.

###Region of Opportunity and Delivery
The required work is located in the National Capital Region (NCR). This includes requirements for:

- Contracting Entity: Canada Revenue Agency 
- Contact Person for any Technical
